entry.title: Thursday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers and flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
